products.productName: Coldplay : Music of The Spheres Concert
products.details: Jakarta, 9 May 2023 - Coldplay have announced their hugely-anticipated return to Asia and Australia with a special run of stadium shows in November 2023, as part of their record-breaking Music Of The Spheres World Tour. The announcement marks the bandâ€™s first ever show in Jakarta, taking place on 15 November at Gelora Bung Karno Stadium.
products.location: Gelora Bung Karno Stadium, Jakarta, Indonesia
